first_para: Guy Thomas Opperman (born 18 May 1965) is a British Conservative Party politician, who was elected at the 2010 general election as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Hexham. He is a well-known supporter of the Living Wage.

full.extract: Guy Thomas Opperman (born 18 May 1965) is a British Conservative Party politician, who was elected at the 2010 general election as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Hexham. He is a well-known supporter of the Living Wage.
full.title: Guy Opperman
